question: Are there any restrictions for intercourse positions in Islam?
answer:
QUESTION
I have heard from my fellows that there are some restrictions in intercourse positions in Islam. And more over there are lot of porn sites on the internet that misguide one from the right way. I am a bit afraid that if I made a sin. May Allah guide us on the right way.
ANSWER


Share:
Allah Ta?ala says in the noble Qur?aan, ?And come to your tilt however you wish to?.

There is no restriction in any position during intercourse. However, it is prohibited to have anul intercourse. It is also prohibited to refer to the porn sites on the internet.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
